ing: 2 (3 ounce) packages raspberry flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "This is one of my Meamaw's recipes for the holidays. It's great for Christmas and Thanksgiving and has been what I've looked forward to during the holidays since I was a little girl. It's also EASY! Hint: make this recipe a day before you serve it so it has time to set."
ins:
In an electric food processor or meat grinder, grind cranberries, oranges, carrot, and pecans. Pour mixture into a large mixing bowl.
In a separate bowl, combine sugar, pineapple, gelatin and both cups of water. Mix the ingredients from the two bowls together. Pour the entire mixture into a mold and chill overnight before serving.
